items.title: I Travel The World And Live Rent-Free By Pet Sitting Full Time

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Charly Stoever, a 35-year-old financial coach, lives rent-free in Portland, Oregon by pet sitting full time and has spent the last 18 months living out of two suitcases. She earns about $60,000 a year from this lifestyle; the story is part of CNBC Make It's Millennial Money series.
bullets: Lifestyle: Full-time pet sitter, living rent-free in Portland, living out of two suitcases for 18 months.
Income: Brings in $60,000 per year from pet sitting.
Series: Segment of CNBC Make It's Millennial Money profiles.
Production credits included (producer, editor, camera, reporter listed).
takeaways: Nontraditional, location-flexible gigs can produce stable annual income (example: $60k/year) — services should support users who aren’t tied to a single residence.
Nomadic lifestyles (traveling, living out of two suitcases) suggest consistent need for reliable mobile and remote access across locations.
Visibility of these users in mainstream media indicates a growing segment that may prioritize mobility and minimal fixed costs when choosing digital services.

items.title: How I earn $900,000 a year as a dermatologist
